name: First Night (1BITSTUDIO, Rynab_7)
description:
For as long as I can remember my dreams and reality have been blurring together, trying to discern what is real and what's not.

From the stress of moving into this apartment complex these events have been occurring more often.

Explore the apartment and save everyone from the power outage.

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact

E - Exit Examine Window

Please leave some feedback as we would love to hear from the audience on what we can improve on and your thoughts on our first game jam project.

Stay tuned for more games to come.

The game was made in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
